validateCsv(String) - Static method in class util.Util
Ensures that an uploaded transactions csv file has a valid date, ticker symbol, transaction type, and total value of the transaction.
validateDate(String) - Static method in class util.Util
Checks if the date provided as a string is in yyyy-MM-dd format.
validatePortfolio(Portfolio) - Method in interface stocks.model.PortfolioManagementModel
Validates a portfolio loaded from an external XML file, if all the stock tickers are supported by the Portfolio manager.
validatePortfolio(Portfolio) - Method in class stocks.model.PortfolioManagementModelImpl
Determines if a portfolio matches a schema.
validateStock() - Method in class stocks.model.StockImplTest
 
validateTransaction(List<TransactionItem>, TransactionItem) - Method in interface stocks.model.PortfolioManagementModel
Performs a buy or a sell operation on the flexible portfolio's stocks based on the transaction line provided as an input.
validateTransaction(List<TransactionItem>, TransactionItem) - Method in class stocks.model.PortfolioManagementModelImpl
 
validateWeight(String) - Static method in class util.Util
Validates if the weight provided is a valid double value.
validateXml(String) - Static method in class util.Util
Checks if a portfolio XML created outside the program is in valid format.
valueOf(String) - Static method in enum util.Constants.TransactionType
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
ViewCompositionPage - Class in stocks.view
Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date to view the composition of the portfolio on that specified date.
ViewCompositionPage(Map<Integer, String>) - Constructor for class stocks.view.ViewCompositionPage
Default constructor that constructs the JFrame with all the Swing components and renders on the screen.
ViewCostBasisPage - Class in stocks.view
Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date to view the cost-basis of the portfolio upto that specified date.
ViewCostBasisPage(Map<Integer, String>) - Constructor for class stocks.view.ViewCostBasisPage
Default constructor that constructs the JFrame with all the Swing components and renders on the screen.
ViewPerformancePage - Class in stocks.view
Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date range to view the performance of the portfolio for that specified date range.
ViewPerformancePage(Map<Integer, String>) - Constructor for class stocks.view.ViewPerformancePage
Default constructor that constructs the JFrame with all the Swing components and renders on the screen.
ViewValuationPage - Class in stocks.view
Displays a GUI screen that allows user to choose a portfolio and provide a date to view the valuation of the portfolio on that specified date.
